title: IMPROVE your raised bed soil the EASY Way! (With cover crops)

tasks.task: Establishing a raised bed garden with cover crops, planting zucchini and marigold seedlings
subtasks: Transporting peas and oats cover crop from a five-gallon bucket
Broadcasting cover crop seeds over the soil
Crimping cover crops using a tomato stick
Covering terminated cover crops with a UV-treated tarp
Removing the tarp and flamed weeding the area
preparing holes by pulling back mulch, adding compost, and planting zucchini and marigold seedlings
Maintaining soil structure and nutrients for pollinator attraction
